nodes.bodyText: Shall we Internationalise the static message?
Why are we showing a static error and the error from backend as well?
the description is a value sent to the database. So didn't update as a static message.
Why are we showing a static error and error from backend as well? Check these in other places as well
fixed with 9c884f8. error from the backend is removed from alert.
